Episodes.Title: Jack Ruby
Episodes.Plot: James "Whitey" Bulger is one of Boston's most notorious gangsters, who reigned supreme in Boston's underworld for more than 20 years.

Episodes.Title: Sam Giancana
Episodes.Plot: The biography of "Nicky Scarfo" reveals the life of one of the most violent American mafia bosses in the past half century.

Episodes.Title: Louis Lepke
Episodes.Plot: Mob boss Louis Lepke dies in the electric chair.

Episodes.Title: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
Episodes.Plot: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano testifies against his boss, John Gotti.

Episodes.Title: Bugsy Siegel
Episodes.Plot: Anthony Spilotro rose from a soldier in Chicago's crime family, The Outfit, to become one of the organization's top enforcers, overseeing the mob's interests in Las Vegas, until meeting a violent end.
